subject: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Supreme Court of the United States 1 First St NE, Washington, DC 20543, USA
Attn: Beneficiary
After proper and several investigations by the Western Union, Money
Gram, International Monetary Fund (IMF) and United Nations (UN)
Offices we found your name amongst those that have sent money through
Western Union, Cash App, Zelle, Venmo, Bank Transfer/Deposit and Money
Gram in the course of receiving your Inheritance, Lottery, United
Nation compensation funds which proves that you have truly been
swindled by those unscrupulous persons by sending money to them
through the above mentioned means.
To this regard United Nations (UN) held a meeting with the Board of
Directors of WESTERN UNION, MONEYGRAM, INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND
(IMF) the FBI alongside with the MINISTRY of FINANCE. As a result of
our investigations it was agreed that your unpaid Funds sum of
$25,000,000.00 should be released to you from the funds set aside by
The United States Department of the Treasury to compensate scam
victims.
The compensation scheme is open to people who wired money to scammers
via Western Union and MoneyGram between January 1, 2008 to December
19, 2021, the deadline for lodging these claims is December 30, 2023.
This case is being handled and supervised by the (FBI-IMF) therefore
we have submitted your details to the paying delegate in charge to
affect the transfer or delivery of your funds. 
The only fee you will
pay is $210 only by Gift Card such as a Steam Wallet or Apple Store
Card. Contact the Delegate Director office through the information
below:
Your Full Name:==
Your Country:====
Your Home Address:====
Your Telephone No:====
Your Nearest airport:==
Sincerely
Sir Stephen Mcallister
Email: 
mcallisterstephen47@gmail.com
From the Department of the Supreme Court of Justice.

subject: Re: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Hello Sir Stephen Mcallister,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite surprising to hear about this situation. I must admit, I wasn't aware that my name was involved in such a matter.

Could you please provide more details about the process? How exactly does the compensation scheme work? And why is there a need for payment through Gift Card such as Steam Wallet or Apple Store Card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Duane

subject: Re: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Attention: We have been sending you a notification letter about these funds
for a month now, but you don't respond. We don't know the reasons why maybe
you don't get the message. But thank God you respond today and let these
management know that you are interested and ready to claim your unpaid fund
to avoid it cancelled. I'm here to make this transaction clear to you
before proceeding I want you to understand this fund is 100% legitimate and
I give you my word with assurance you will receive it within two days if
you follow my instructions as you were directed. Anyone who is real and
professional for his or her job should know everything necessary to handle
the business or transaction for the first time and you must tell your
clients the truth for the first time before providing to avoid confusion or
blaming. Examples: Anyone who wants to take advantage of people in a
business or any transaction will not tell you the truth all about the
transaction will cost you up front from the beginning to make sure they
deceive people and take advantage of them.

Being a true professional you must first tell your client the truth so that
he or she will decide to comply or not after knowing the truth to avoid
blame or confusion. Therefore this funds process will cost you only nothing
but $850.00 for settlement of taxes and transaction process fee. Please be
informed and advised that you CANNOT have access to your funds without
paying the fee because your fund has not yet cleared. If there's anything
you don't understand clearly, feel free to ask, but I'm sure I explained
the details you need to know. Note that as soon as you send the fees, we
shall proceed with the process of your payment immediately and complete the
transaction within 4 working days. I know it will be delayed for you but
this is how this management works to make sure we don't let our citizens
down or disappoint them. If you are comfortable with this administration,
Below is our mode of receiving your fee $850, so you should choose your
best choice and send the fee. 1 You can send the fee Though Bitcoin, Cashap
(3) Through Gift card such as Steam Wallet card, Apple Store card make your
choice and reply back okay.

Here's the PayPal account details
PayPal account Email/I'd:  raeisha007@gmail.com
Account Name: Raeisha Thomas
Select:  Family and friends

Here's the Cashapp Tag below:   $kitty8809

WE WAIT TO HEAR FROM YOU SOONEST.
You can reach me on Whatsapp +1 (330) 910-7457
Thanks
Justice Sonia Sotomayor
